title: Create Booking Detail Component
description: Develop UI component for displaying detailed booking information including service, slot, and status details

user_stories: As a customer, I want to view detailed booking information so that I can verify appointment details
As a service provider, I want to see booking details so that I can prepare for appointments
business_rules: Booking detail view must show complete booking information including service and slot details
Booking detail view must follow the design system
Booking detail view must handle loading states and error messages
Booking detail view must display status information clearly
edge_cases: Handling loading states for booking details
Managing error conditions when booking data is not available
Displaying booking information with proper status indicators
Handling bookings with missing or incomplete information

acceptance_criteria: Booking detail component shows complete booking information
Booking detail component follows the design system
Booking detail component handles loading states and error conditions properly
Booking detail component integrates with Appointment Management API endpoints
Booking detail component displays service and slot information

integration_tests: Booking detail integration with backend APIs

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement booking detail component following Angular best practices. Ensure proper integration with appointment management API. Display related information like service and slot details.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper authorization checks for booking detail access. Protect sensitive booking information. Validate data before display.
